name: CGFontPostScriptFormat
desc: Possible formats for a PostScript font subset.

items.name: case type1
items.desc: This is documented in Adobe Type 1 Font Format, which is available from http://partners.adobe.com/.

items.name: case type3
items.desc: This is documented in PostScript Language Reference, 3rd edition, which is available from http://partners.adobe.com/.

items.name: case type42
items.desc: This is documented in Adobe Technical Note 5012, The Type 42 Font Format Specification, which is available from http://partners.adobe.com/.
